New Records: Bam Adebayo flirted with a triple-double
The Pelicans have dropped 15 in a row on the road, a 100th time in NBA history that a team has had a road losing streak of 15 or more in the same season
Key Match Events: Trey Murphy III scored 34 for the Pelicans
Jimmy Butler had nine points, four rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes on 3-for-5 shooting
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans have struggled this season, losing 29 of their last 32 games and 20 of their last 21 contests
Post-Match Reflections: The Heat won 119-108, never trailing in the game
The Pelicans lost for the 29th time in their last 32 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on the same day that at least 15 people were killed in New Orleans when a truck drove into a crowd of New Year's revelers on Bourbon Street
Jimmy Butler played in his first game following a five-game absence due to illness
